## My Shark Attack Data
- shark attack data around the world
- between the years of 1960 - 2015
- 2257 observations

```{r, include = FALSE}

SharkAttackdata <- read.csv("../data/SharkAttackdata.csv")

```


```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE
)
```

## Shark Attack Data
```{r}

knitr::kable(
  SharkAttackdata [1:5, ], 
  caption = "A knitr kable.")

```
